food.name:
A1. *SIGNATURE PLATTER(Đặc biệt)
- Crispy shrimp spring roll (1),
Crispy chicken spring roll (1),
- Crispy Calamari (4),
Crispy wonton (4), Fresh rolls (2)

A2. *CRISPY SHRIMP SPRING ROLLS (2) (Chả giò tôm)
-Marinated tiger shrimp & mixed vegetables

A3. *CRISPY CHICKEN SPRING ROLLS (2) (Cha gio ga)
-Ground chicken & mixed vegetables

A4. CRISPY VEGETABLE SPRING ROLLS (2) (Cha gio chay)
- Mixed vegetables

A5. *FRESH ROLLS (2) (Goi cuon nem nuong)
-Rice paper with BBQ grilled pork sausage & vermicelli

A6. SHRIMP & PORK FRESH ROLLS (2) (Goi cuon tom thit)
-Rice paper with shrimp, pork, vegetables & vermicelli

A7. TOFU & VEGGIE FRESH ROLLS (2) (Goi cuon chay)
-Rice paper with crispy tofu, vegetables & vermicelli

A8. *CHICKEN SATAY SKEWERS (2)( Ga sa-te)
-Marinated with Thai spices and grilled, served with peanut sauce

A9. SHRIMP SATAY SKEWERS (2) (Tom sa-te)
-Marinated with Thai spices and grilled, served with peanut sauce

A10. CRISPY TIGER SHRIMPS (5) (Tom chien gion)
-Crispy breaded tiger shrimps

A11. CRISPY CALAMARI (10) (Muc chien gion)
-Lightly seasoned crispy calamari

A12. CRISPY SHRIMP BEANCURD (Tau hu ky)
-Crispy dried beancurd wrapped with shrimp

A13. CRISPY TOFU(Tau hu chien)
-Crispy marinated tofu

A14. *CRISPY WONTON (8)(Wonton chien)
-Crispy marinated, stuffed chicken/ shrimp wontons

A15. MUSSELS WITH BLACK BEAN SAUCE(Mussels xao tuong den)
-Stir- fried and marinated with house spices
